description: To create the FAX file, select Define → Print Templates → Faxes... , select the "+" button in the top-right, name the template, and click OK . You will then be able to edit the template layout and its dimensions. Click OK when you're finished.
When creating a new .NWP fax document, you can select a FAX template to work off of by choosing a template from the "Use Template" dropdown menu.
To select the template you want to print from, select File → Print Templates... , choose your template from the "Template Type" dropdown menu, and click OK .
